title: Light My Fire
description: Lily MacIntyre needs to shed her sitcom teen-queen image if she's going to carve out a real career in Hollywood. A tabloid-worthy fling with rocker Nate Lansford�her childhood friend and new cohost of a reality talent show�should do it. As long as she can accept that the notorious player will be moving on to the next eager conquest when the season wraps.Long before Nate's hard-hearted image took hold, he and Lily were each other's protectors and allies. No one knows him the way she does�and he doesn't want his messed-up past to muddy up her potential. For once, the bad boy is trying to be good. Not easy when the good girl is getting wicked with him in the back of his limo and every white-hot kiss proves they can never be "just friends" again….
author: Kristina Knight
